compatibility.notes: The OFL-1.1-RFN license is designed to be permissive and compatible with many open-source licenses, particularly those that are also permissive. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Must not sell the Font Software by itself.
Must include the license and copyright notice in redistributions.
Must not use Reserved Font Names for Modified Versions without permission.
license.name: OFL-1.1-RFN
obligations: The Font Software or its components cannot be sold by themselves.
Each copy of the Font Software must include the copyright notice and the license.
Modified Versions cannot use Reserved Font Names without permission.
